Incorporate specific evidence or examples earlier in the discussion of patriarchal mindset to support the main idea.
Improve transitions between sentences discussing mindset and gender roles to enhance logical progression.
Add critical analysis to explain the implications of economic independence on decision-making.

Expand on the constitutional rights example with specific analysis to add depth to the argumentation.
